subject: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2052
description_text: Hello, your VAM Pro Set (3 pac/includes power supply) has been returned. We cannot find a tax-free channel to ship to Puerto Rico. We can ship it to you via UPS, but there may be customs duties. Is that acceptable to you?

conversations.body_text:
Hi, I ordered a pedal set and the VAM Pro set. The shipping problem is only
with the VAM Pro set or both?

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 4:53 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Hector Lopez,     Your pedals are being shipped from the US, and although shipping to Puerto Rico is expensive, there should be no problems. The VAM Pro set can only be shipped from China, and there are very limited shipping options to Puerto Rico. We cannot find a tax-free shipping channel. https://tools.usps.com/go/TrackConfirmAction_input?qtc_tLabels1=9234690383093300110112

Is the VAM Pro set something you can ship from the US when it gets back in
stock? If not we should cancel that part of the order.

Do you know if the mounting brackets are available to ship from the US?
(this one here:
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets)

Thank you

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 9:33 PM support@simsonn.com
